title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Migrating your VMware workloads with on-premises dependencies (HMC309)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 迁移具有本地依赖关系的VMware工作负载 (HMC309)
abstract: While most VMware workloads can be easily migrated to the cloud, some need to stay on-premises due to application interdependencies, data residency requirements, or timeline constraints. Join this session to learn how AWS hybrid and edge services like AWS Outposts and AWS Local Zones allow you to migrate in place and modernize at your own pace. Dive deep on various migration pathways with Outposts and Local Zones and the migration tools and programs that you can use to simplify and accelerate transition to the cloud.
abstract_cn: 虽然大多数VMware工作负载可以轻松迁移到云端，但有些工作负载由于应用程序相互依赖性、数据驻留要求或时间限制等原因需要保留在本地。参加本次会议，了解AWS混合云和边缘服务（如AWS Outposts和AWS Local Zones）如何让您能够就地迁移并按照自己的节奏进行现代化改造。深入探讨使用Outposts和Local Zones的各种迁移路径，以及可用于简化和加速云过渡的迁移工具和计划。
